Question
========

From a randomly drawn sample of 7 individuals, the length of the left and right arms was measured (in cm.):

  ------------ ---- ---- ---- ---- ---- ---- ---- left arm 68 67 70 79 65 70 75 right arm 69 76 69 80 66 73 76 ------------ ---- ---- ---- ---- ---- ---- ----

We want keys H~0~: μ(left) - μ(right) = 0. counter H~1~: μ(left) - μ(right) \< 0\. Give the critical value of the one-sided test with risk 0.05.

Answerlist
----------

* 2.44
* 1.78
* -1.75
* -2.18

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 2.44: Incorrect
* 1.78: Incorrect
-1.75: Correct
-2.18: Incorrect
